body.name: 1 Pack Plastic Pencil Box 2 Compartments, Large Capacity Pencil Cases Crayon Box Hard Pencil Case, Clear Pencil Boxes with Snap-Tight Lid, School Supply Box for Girls Boys Kids (Green)

features: 【Hard Plastic Pencil Box】Made of high-quality sturdy PP plastic to ensure the pencil boxes are durable. Transparent and visible design, the box contents can be seen at a glance, easy to find. A total of 6 colors to choose from, which are blue, yellow, purple, clear, and green. Application age: 3 yrs+.

【2 Compartment Pencil Case】Overall dimensions of the pencil cases are 8.1" x 4.7" x 2.3". The upper compartment measures 6.8" x 3.5" x 0.7" , the lower measures 8.1" x 4.7" x 1.6". Lower main storage holds up to 80 pencils and the upper holds small sticky notes and other stationery. Portable & lightweight, can be put in the school backpack to carry around.

【Snap-Tight Lid】The crayon box with a lid is designed to prevent items from dusting and getting dirty. Clear pencil box with snaps to store items safely inside the box, not easy to lose. Push down to snap and push up to open, easy to open with one hand. Flexible hinge, not easy to break.

【Rounded Corners & Non-Slip Bottom】Plastic school box has rounded corners for comfortable and secure holding. All four corners of the bottom of the plastic school supply box have a right-angle shaped raised portion with a non-slip effect. Pen case can be stacked on top of each other for neat display and save space.

【Multi-Function】Meiikun plastic box is a multifunctional storage box. Not merely a pencil case for storing stationery. It can also be used as a craft storage container, sewing box, earring box, marker case and so on. Keep your desktop and drawers tidy and create a comfortable study and office space.
body.description: Desktop & Drawer Organizers Are you experiencing the following troubles? Pencils, pens, crayons, scissors, paper clips, and other stationery strewn across the desk can't be organized properly. Sewing tools, beading craft materials, manicure tools or earrings are all over the drawer and cannot be categorized and neatly stored.Do you want to change the clutter? Meiikun pencil organizer will be a great addition to your study, office or home. Pencil boxes can be stacked between each other and placed on the table. Save space and take it freely. Transparent pen case, the contents are clearly visible. You can also prepare your own labeling stickers to label the box. You can also prepare cute little stickers to DIY a unique pen box. Sort items into separate organizers and place them in drawers, so that when you need an item, you can simply open the drawer and look at it to find the one you want.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: Practical Large Pencil Box Do you need a portable plastic pencil case?Are you looking for a simple and practical pencil box?Are you still worrying that the objects scattered on the table can't be neatly organized?Meiikun Large Capacity Pencil Boxes can help you well. The double compartment design is good for organizing your small objects, such as pencils, pens, erasers, scissors, and other office equipment. You can also organize craft materials, drawing tools, earrings, data cables, etc.Multifunctional storage boxes for school, home, and office. It is a school supply for students, suitable for elementary, middle school, and college.

2 Compartments Large Capacity Pencil Case Size: The overall dimensions of the pencil cases are 8.1 x 4.7 x 2.3 inches. The upper compartment measures 6.8 x 3.5 x 0.7 inches. Please note that the product dimensions are measured manually, there may be slight errors, but in kind shall prevail.Capacity: The lower primary storage compartment can hold up to 80 pencils. The upper compartment can store small items such as sticky notes.2 Compartments: Lower layer has large capacity storage, and the upper layer holds small stationery. Categorized storage and easier access.

Crayon Box Details Portable Size: Fits in the size of a backpack, easy to carry around, whether it's to school or out of the office. Transparent Design: No need to open it to see at a glance what is placed in the crayon box. Easy to find, save time, easy to work. Rounded Corner Design: Safe while having a comfortable grip and superb workmanship. School is suitable for students or teachers.Flexible Hinge: The process of using the clear pencil box makes it easy to open the lid, allowing for easy opening and closing. The hinge does not break easily and stands up to daily use.Non-Slip Bottom: 4 corners of the bottom of the pencil organizer are designed with right-angle shaped bumps, which have a non-slip effect. The pencil cases can be stacked on top of each other and placed neatly on the desktop.Snap-Tight Lid: One-piece molded snap closure opens with a push and closes with a press. Easily locks the valve and securely protects items from falling open. The well-designed snap is easy to use and can be easily opened with one hand.

6 Colors & 4 Quantity Options 1 Pack colors are blue, pink, yellow, purple, green, and clear.3 Pack color combinations are: blue, pink, yellow as a set; blue, purple, clear as a set.4 Pack color combinations are: blue, yellow, pink, and purple as a set; blue, clear, purple, and pink as a set.6 Pack color combinations: all 6 are transparent; Or 6 different colors. Sort items into separate organizers and place them in drawers, so that when you need an item, you can simply open the drawer and look at it to find the one you want.

Multifunctional Plastic Organizer Box Not just a hard pencil case. Organizer box can be used in different scenarios and plays an important role in life.School: The clear pencil box can easily hold school supplies such as pencils, pens, erasers, eraser tapes, small rulers, and other stationery. It can also hold crayons, watercolors, art brush pens and drawing tools. A must-have for students and teachers in the classroom at school.Office: Pens, sticky notes, glue sticks, data cables, and other small objects scattered on the desk are organized in the plastic box and placed on the desktop or drawer. Tidy office environment, efficient office.Home: Sewing tools like scissors, needles, pins, thread, etc. can be neatly organized. Cute accessories such as earrings and hair cards can also be stored, and the plastic storage boxes with lids are designed to prevent the contents from coming into contact with dust. reviews.reviewText: Holds a decent amount of art supplies and keeps them organized.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 27, 2024
reviews.reviewText: Used this to make a little emergency kit for my car! Fits a lot of stuff!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Pricey but it’s become my favorite
reviews.reviewText: This style of pencil box is really cool, I often end up with little dividers (plastic inserts from snack foods mostly) helping to organize my pencil boxes. This is so cool, easy to open and close securely (well as easy as most pencil boxes), easy to see what’s in it without it looking too messy. Love this especially for keeping different pens and markers together that go well for the same type of paper or purpose (lettering or coloring or writing) but helping me have a little less to dig through and get to the exact one I need more quickly. It’s pricey though, that’s really the only downside since other pencil boxes can be found for so much less, but this is a huge step up from snack food dividers, it saves me time and frustration finding what I want.
